total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the pattern of the number 8 in the input grid.
Q2: Determine the rules for changing the number 8 to a different number in the output grid.
Q3: Identify the different regions in the input grid where the number 8 forms a specific pattern.
Q4: Apply the rules identified in Q2 to the regions identified in Q3 to generate the output grid.
